thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 13 of 40
thread.title: Guest

author: Guest
title: Guest
text:
Outstanding service and support. My auto Gaggia is awesome! Before I purchased, I spoke with staff by phone and let them know this was my first auto machine. I described my favorite drinks, and they cheerfully helped me in making the best selection in a machine. I really appreciated the honest advice and help in making my decision.
I ran into a minor problem in setup and WholeLatteLove had great support for the machine. I was able to easily find the info I needed to get my new machine up and running. The reviews and suggestions on the site were spot on as well.
Very happy that I chose to buy from WholeLatteLove!
